title: The Troskyite fraudster
author: VD
content_html:
Never forget that Ben Shapiro has never, ever, been on your side. He hates you, he hates President Trump, he hates your Christian faith, and he hates Western Civilization.

No, Trump has not already won the election, and it is deeply irresponsible for him to say he has.

– Ben Shapiro, 4 November 2020

The Littlest Chickenhawk is going to try to walk back his Never Trump statements after the events of the coming weeks. So don’t be fooled by his lies and misrepresentations.
